availableCommands.name: compact
availableCommands.description: Clear conversation history but keep a summary in context. Optional: /compact [instructions for summarization]

availableCommands.name: init
availableCommands.description: Initialize a new CLAUDE.md file with codebase documentation

availableCommands.name: pr-comments
availableCommands.description: Get comments from a GitHub pull request

availableCommands.name: security-review
availableCommands.description: Complete a security review of the pending changes on the current branch

```
     1‚Üíuse gpui::{
     2‚Üí    div, prelude::*, px, App, Context, ElementId, Entity, FocusHandle, Focusable, IntoElement,
     3‚Üí    ParentElement, Render, ScrollHandle, SharedString, StatefulInteractiveElement, Styled, Window,
     4‚Üí};
     5‚Üíuse gpui_component::{
     6‚Üí    button::{Button, ButtonVariants},
     7‚Üí    collapsible::Collapsible,
     8‚Üí    h_flex,
     9‚Üí    input::InputState,
    10‚Üí    v_flex, ActiveTheme, Icon, IconName, Sizable,
    11‚Üí};
    12‚Üí
    13‚Üí// Use the published ACP schema crate
    14‚Üíuse agent_client_protocol_schema::{
    15‚Üí    ContentBlock, ContentChunk, EmbeddedResourceResource, Plan, SessionUpdate, ToolCall,
    16‚Üí    ToolCallContent, ToolCallStatus,
    17‚Üí};
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üíuse crate::{
    20‚Üí    core::agent::AgentHandle, panels::dock_panel::DockPanel, AgentMessage, AgentMessageData,
    21‚Üí    AgentTodoList, AppState, ChatInputBox, PermissionRequestView, UserMessageData,
    22‚Üí};
    23‚Üí
    24‚Üí// Import from types module
    25‚Üíuse super::types::{get_file_icon, ResourceInfo, ToolCallStatusExt, ToolKindExt};
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí// ============================================================================
    28‚Üí// Stateful Resource Item
    29‚Üí// ============================================================================
    30‚Üí
    31‚Üístruct ResourceItemState {
    32‚Üí    resource: ResourceInfo,
    33‚Üí    open: bool,
    34‚Üí}
    35‚Üí
    36‚Üíimpl ResourceItemState {
    37‚Üí    fn new(resource: ResourceInfo) -> Self {
    38‚Üí        Self {
    39‚Üí            resource,
    40‚Üí            open: false,
    41‚Üí        }
    42‚Üí    }
    43‚Üí
    44‚Üí    fn toggle(&mut self, cx: &mut Context<Self>) {
    45‚Üí        self.open = !self.open;
    46‚Üí        cx.notify();
    47‚Üí    }
    48‚Üí}
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üíimpl Render for ResourceItemState {
    51‚Üí    fn render(&mut self, _: &mut Window, cx: &mut Context<Self>) -> impl IntoElement {
    52‚Üí        let line_count = self
    53‚Üí            .resource
    54‚Üí            .text
    55‚Üí            .as_ref()
    56‚Üí            .map(|t| t.lines().count())
    57‚Üí            .unwrap_or(0);
    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí        let is_open = self.open;
    60‚Üí        let has_content = self.resource.text.is_some();
    61‚Üí        let resource_name = self.resource.name.clone();
    62‚Üí        let mime_type = self.resource.mime_type.clone();
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí        Collapsible::new()
    65‚Üí            .open(is_open)
    66‚Üí            .w_full()
    67‚Üí            .gap_2()
    68‚Üí            .child(
    69‚Üí                h_flex()
    70‚Üí                    .items_center()
    71‚Üí                    .gap_2()
    72‚Üí                    .p_2()
    73‚Üí                    .rounded(cx.theme().radius)
    74‚Üí                    .bg(cx.theme().muted)
    75‚Üí                    .border_1()
    76‚Üí                    .border_color(cx.theme().border)
    77‚Üí                    .child(
    78‚Üí                        Icon::new(get_file_icon(&mime_type.map(|s| s.to_string())))
    79‚Üí                            .size(px(16.))
    80‚Üí                            .text_color(cx.theme().accent),
    81‚Üí                    )
    82‚Üí                    .child(
    83‚Üí                        div()
    84‚Üí                            .flex_1()
    85‚Üí                            .text_size(px(13.))
    86‚Üí                            .font_weight(gpui::FontWeight::MEDIUM)
    87‚Üí                            .text_color(cx.theme().foreground)
    88‚Üí                            .child(resource_name.clone()),
    89‚Üí                    )
    90‚Üí                    .when(line_count > 0, |this| {
    91‚Üí                        this.child(
    92‚Üí                            div()
    93‚Üí                                .text_size(px(11.))
    94‚Üí                                .text_color(cx.theme().muted_foreground)
    95‚Üí                                .child(format!("{} lines", line_count)),
    96‚Üí                        )
    97‚Üí                    })
    98‚Üí                    .when(has_content, |this| {
    99‚Üí                        this.child(
   100‚Üí                            Button::new(SharedString::from(format!(

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>
```

    54‚Üípub struct WorkspaceTask {
    55‚Üí    /// Unique identifier for the task
    56‚Üí    pub id: String,
    57‚Üí    /// Workspace this task belongs to
    58‚Üí    pub workspace_id: String,
    59‚Üí    /// Task name/description
    60‚Üí    pub name: String,
    61‚Üí    /// Agent used for this task
    62‚Üí    pub agent_name: String,
    63‚Üí    /// Task mode (Auto, Ask, Plan, Code, Explain)
    64‚Üí    pub mode: String,
    65‚Üí    /// Session ID if a session has been created
    66‚Üí    pub session_id: Option<String>,
    67‚Üí    /// Task status
    68‚Üí    pub status: TaskStatus,
    69‚Üí    /// When the task was created
    70‚Üí    #[serde(with = "chrono::serde::ts_seconds")]
    71‚Üí    pub created_at: chrono::DateTime<chrono::Utc>,
    72‚Üí    /// Last message preview
    73‚Üí    #[serde(skip)]
    74‚Üí    pub last_message: Option<SharedString>,
    75‚Üí}
    76‚Üí
    77‚Üíimpl WorkspaceTask {
    78‚Üí    /// Create a new task for a workspace
    79‚Üí    pub fn new(workspace_id: String, name: String, agent_name: String, mode: String) -> Self {
    80‚Üí        Self {
    81‚Üí            id: uuid::Uuid::new_v4().to_string(),
    82‚Üí            workspace_id,
    83‚Üí            name,
    84‚Üí            agent_name,
    85‚Üí            mode,
    86‚Üí            session_id: None,
    87‚Üí            status: TaskStatus::Pending,
    88‚Üí            created_at: chrono::Utc::now(),
    89‚Üí            last_message: None,
    90‚Üí        }
    91‚Üí    }
    92‚Üí
    93‚Üí    /// Associate a session with this task
    94‚Üí    pub fn set_session(&mut self, session_id: String) {
    95‚Üí        self.session_id = Some(session_id);
    96‚Üí        self.status = TaskStatus::InProgress;
    97‚Üí    }

   102‚Üí    }
